alert.note: Alert for Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 3:44AM MST until December 27 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Southern Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Blowing dust and localized blowing snow will reduce visibility to less than a half mile in places.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Sudden reductions in visibility may occur. Use extra caution if traveling and be alert for suddenly slowed or stopped traffic.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
